comment.author: 9031446@N05
comment._content: This photo seems to be misidentified.  That is Joshua Lawrence Chamberlain.

comment.author: 77608002@N03
comment._content: Samuel? They didn't even have a brother named Samuel. This is, in fact, Joshua L. Chamberlain. Shame, shame!

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Thanks for reminding us that this is Joshua Chamberlain!  The original caption in our catalog was added incorrectly, so we are working on fixing that too.  We appreciate your help with updating our catalog!

Mary
U.S. National Archives

comment.author: 77608002@N03
comment._content: Thank you, USNA for correcting it so quickly! :)
